# kclsu-countdown



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property            | Attribute    | Description                                                    | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------- | ------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `date` _(required)_ | `date`       | The date to countdown to. Must match date string format        | `string` | `undefined` |
| `fontsize`          | `fontsize`   | Optional: set a fixed font-size for tablet, desktop and wider. | `any`    | `undefined` |
| `text`              | `text`       | The text beneath the countdown                                 | `any`    | `undefined` |
| `textcolour`        | `textcolour` | Optional: set a colour for the text beneath the countdown.     | `any`    | `undefined` |
